src_original: jātyām asatyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavati jātinirodhāj jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ
tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṃ nv asati jātir na bhavati kasya nirodhāj jātinirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi
tgt_original: 時復生此念： 『由何而無生？ 』觀此生原，有滅，生則滅。

src_original: tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṃ nv asati tṛṣṇā na bhavati kasya nirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi

vedanāyām asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ  tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṃ nv asati vedanā na bhavati kasya nirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi
